description: Our list allows you to easily and efficiently browse through offers and players at the location. You can search for topics like Blockchain, Digital Health, Biotech et. and filter by types such as startup, available space, research, etc. This way you can get inspired and, for example, see what is available on a certain topic or which startups are in the region. But you can also look for something specific, such as a suitable coworking space or an accelerator or incubator program. It's best if you do it yourself:
